ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: A Bard's Lament
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, just read that, that means I get to stay in Kunark till 19 or so when I have to go dump all those saved training points into Hand to Hand. I am not
ygData.messageBody:
> No need to go train dual wield. Just zone or camp after getting
> level 17.

Yeah, just read that, that means I get to stay in Kunark till 19 or so when
I have to go dump all those saved training points into Hand to Hand. I am
not going to bother with sneak, unless someone here just raves about how
useful it is. I have never used it with Tszaaz.

Okay, I think it's time for Newbie Bard to come out of the closet *laughs*.
It looks like I am committed to playing him, and now that he is tricked out
in all my favorite pre-lambent armour the phase of figuring out how to get
started in a new world is pretty much over. So, if you see Tsengu, Wood Elf
bard on nameless running around, wave and say "hi!". *smiles*

Tszaaz/Tsengu


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
